attributes.action: To create all-plastics recycling not the bottles only!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition is to create possibility of recycling of all plastics [not the bottles only like in Hampshire].
This is possible in process called thermal decomposition. It is used even in Eastern Europe - recycled plastic is converted to diesel fuel and other chemicals.
Waste energy from process is used for heating and in other processes.
